task.title: Specify an Irregularly Shaped Selection Area
task.shortdesc: You can select objects with an irregularly shaped area defined by the specified points. Under the prompt of SELECT command, you can select objects entirely enclosed by the selection area with the WPolygon, or the objects enclosed or crossed by the selection area with the CPolygon.

step.cmd: On the command line, type WP (WPolygon).
Specify the vertices of the polygon.
To complete the selectionpolygon, press Enter.

result.p: Window Polygon by specifying the vertices of the polygon (A, B, and C) Resulting selection
